name: InvisibleRage!!!
description:
Travel around in a half visible world where you have to beat the clock and make it to the flag in under 1 minute.

FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED.

How to play:

You have one minute and your task is to get to the flag before the timer reaches 1:00. There are hidden pathways that you have to find. Stay keen and try to find coins that are in unusual places to get idea where the invisible block could be. Unusual placing of a ground piece can also hit towards there being a hidden pathway.

Controls:

Arrows to move and space to jump.
